docs.lead_paragraph: A person with knowledge of the situation tells The Associated Press that linebacker Reuben Foster, a potential top-10 pick, has been sent home from the NFL's annual combine.

headline.print_headline: 'Bama Star Linebacker Foster Sent Home From NFL Combine
headline.main: 'Bama Star Linebacker Foster Sent Home From NFL Combine

docs.snippet: A person with knowledge of the situation tells The Associated Press that linebacker Reuben Foster, a potential top-10 pick, has been sent home from the NFL's annual combine....

docs.lead_paragraph: George Hill called his two-point performance in a loss Wednesday "horse poop." The Utah Jazz guard's uber-efficient effort Friday night was the exact opposite.

headline.print_headline: Hill Scores 34, Jazz Beat Nets 112-97 in Wire-To-Wire Win
headline.main: Hill Scores 34, Jazz Beat Nets 112-97 in Wire-To-Wire Win

docs.snippet: George Hill called his two-point performance in a loss Wednesday "horse poop." The Utah Jazz guard's uber-efficient effort Friday night was the exact opposite....

docs.lead_paragraph: The Cleveland Cavaliers have been on a three-point binge since the first of the year. On Friday, they took it step further and set an NBA record in the process.

headline.main: Cavaliers Shatter Record With Three-Point Barrage

docs.snippet: The Cleveland Cavaliers have been on a three-point binge since the first of the year. On Friday, they took it step further and set an NBA record in the process....

docs.lead_paragraph: India captain Virat Kohli won the toss and opted to bat in the second match of their four-test series against an unchanged Australia at the M. Chinnaswamy Stadium on Saturday.
